remediation: A fix was pushed into the master branch but not yet published.
title: Uncontrolled Resource Consumption ('Resource Exhaustion')

vulnDescription.Overview: Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to Uncontrolled Resource Consumption ('Resource Exhaustion') via the ctts_box_read function of file src/isomedia/box_code_base.c. An attacker can cause a crash or disruption of service by triggering an error in the function's handling of input.
